item.title: Upcoming R for Microsoft training days
item.description: In May, I will be delivering two R for Microsoft training days. These two days will focus on some R fundamentals and applying these fundamentals within the Microsoft Data Platform. These training days are ideal if you know one half of the components – whether that’s the R bit or the Microsoft BI bit. Either way, you’ll learn about the other half. SQLBits SQLBits XV is being held in Liverpool this year and my training day is on May 4th.
